string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Beginner/novice cyclists. Basic bike skills required. Most bikes and hybrids. Some green routes can take trailers.
Intermediate cyclist/mountain bikers with basic offroad riding skills. Mountain bikes and hybrids.
Proficient mountain bikers with good off-road riding skills. Suitable for better quality off-road mountain bikes.
Expert mountain bike users, used to physically demanding routes. Quality off-road mountain bikes.
